question: Which nations constitute the regional group "CIVETS"?
option1: Canada, Ireland, Vietnam, Ecuador, Thailand, South Africa
option2: Colombia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Egypt, Turkey, South Africa
option3: China, Indonesia, Vietnam, Egypt, Turkey, South Africa
option4: China, Indonesia, Venezuela, Egypt, Turkey, South Africa
answer: Colombia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Egypt, Turkey, South Africa
explanation: CIVETS are a group of six emerging market economies such as Colombia, Indonesia, Vietnam, Egypt, Turkey and South Africa. These nations decided to form a group because of its diverse and dynamic economy and young population.
